director.name: 亚历山大·克鲁格 Alexander Kluge

this_title: The Mammoth’s Homecoming, a Composition of Th. W. Adorno in the Year 1941
introduction: Adorno is not just a theorist and philosopher, he was also a composer and student of Alban Berg in Vienna. The text of the short song goes: “What’s driving there, on a cart and stretches out his long trunk?/ It is a mammoth! It is a mammoth! It is a mammoth which wants to go home.”
chinese_title: The Mammoth’s Homecoming, a Composition of Th. W. Adorno in the Year 1941
